headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Rewards and Bonuses
content:
This week in Los Santos, players can continue to enjoy Double Rewards in the Race Series - along with the smug satisfaction that comes with leaving your competitors sputtering in a cloud of tire-smoke.

Meanwhile, players who call up Ms. Agatha Baker for some Casino Work will receive 2X GTA$, RP and Casino Chips, whether it's for destroying a counterfeit chip factory or threatening a litigious judge.

Plus, VIP/CEO Work Missions and Challenges pay out 2X GTA$ through the end of the week.
